de.systemagmbh.components.config
Class ASysConfigItem

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.components.config.ASysConfigItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, ISysConfigItem, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CSysGenericConfigItem
Deprecated. As of release 2.5, replaced by de.systemagmbh.tools.config.ASysConfigItem

public abstract class ASysConfigItem
extends Object
implements Serializable, Cloneable, ISysConfigItem

This abstract class implements common methods for ISysConfigItem.

Version:
$Revision: 1.10 $
Author:
Eugen Obermeier
See Also:
ISysConfigItem, Serialized Form

getItem

public abstract ISysConfigItem getItem(String name)
                                throws CSysItemNotFoundException
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: ISysConfigItem
Returns the first child with the same name.

A certain implementation may allow a name including path split by a special delimiter ("/"(slash) recommended).

Example:
You can use 
 anItem.getItem("Section1/Subsection2/Item3");
instead of 
 anItem.getItem("Section1").getItem("Subsection2").getItem("Item3");

Specified by:
getItem in interface ISysConfigItem
Parameters:
name - the name of the child item to search for
Throws:
CSysItemNotFoundException - if no child with this name exists.

getItem

public abstract ISysConfigItem getItem(String name,
                                       int searchDepth)
                                throws CSysItemNotFoundException
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: ISysConfigItem
Get the first child item 'name' from this item. Search backwards in tree up to searchDepth levels to find it.

Specified by:
getItem in interface ISysConfigItem
Parameters:
name - the name of the child item to search for
searchDepth - the number of levels in root direction
Throws:
CSysItemNotFoundException - if not found.

getOptionalItem

public abstract ISysConfigItem getOptionalItem(String name)
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: ISysConfigItem
Returns the first child with the same name or an empty child, if not found. Use this method to get a value from an item that is not mandatory. Example:
   ISysConfigItem anItem;
   Boolean b;
   b = root.getOptionalItem("This/Path/Does/Not/Exist/theBooleanItem")
       .getBooleanValue(new Boolean(true));
In the given example getItem() would throw a CSysItemNotFoundException.

Specified by:
getOptionalItem in interface ISysConfigItem
Parameters:
name - the name of the item to find or the name of the item to create, if not found
Returns:
the found item or a new item with the given name

createItem

public abstract ISysConfigItem createItem(String name,
                                          Object value)
Deprecated. 
Description copied from interface: ISysConfigItem
Creates a new item with the given name and the given value that has no parent. The type of the new item is determined by the specified value.
  • value != null type = parameter
  • value == null type = section

Specified by:
createItem in interface ISysConfigItem
Parameters:
name - name of the new item
value - value of the new item.

getType in interface ISysConfigItem
Returns:
-1 for unknown type

public abstract Object getValue()

Returns the value of this item or null if the value is empty. It is recommended to use de.systemagmbh.common.util.CSysConv to convert the Object returned by getValue() into the expected type.

getValue in interface ISysConfigItem
Returns:
the value of this element or null if the value is empty.

itemToString

public String itemToString(ISysConfigItem item,
                           int initialIindent)
Deprecated. 
Returns a string containing this item and all child items with one item per line. Each line is indented by a certain amount of spaces to represent the tree structure.

Parameters:
item - The item to start from.
